style: Linocut, Woodblock Print, Graphic Novel Art, High Contrast
use_case: Book cover illustration for folk horror or mystery novels
template: [SUBJECT] in a stark, treeless winter forest, a rustic [BUILDING_TYPE] nestled among the desolate trees, with a foreground of abstract, swirling [GROUND_TEXTURE] patterns and a small reflective [WATER_BODY]. The overall atmosphere is [MOOD], with limited, desaturated [COLOR_PALETTE] colors, rendered in a high-contrast linocut style with strong, graphic lines and textures. --ar 4:5

variable_explanations.[SUBJECT]: The main focus of the image, typically a figure or a central object.
variable_explanations.[BUILDING_TYPE]: Specifies the kind of structure, e.g., cabin, shack, ruin, lighthouse.
variable_explanations.[GROUND_TEXTURE]: Describes the unique pattern or texture of the ground, e.g., swirling water, cracked earth, mossy rocks.
variable_explanations.[WATER_BODY]: The type of water feature present, e.g., pond, stream, puddle, well.
variable_explanations.[MOOD]: The emotional tone of the artwork, e.g., eerie, peaceful, lonely, mysterious.
variable_explanations.[COLOR_PALETTE]: Defines the dominant colors or lack thereof, e.g., desaturated blues and grays, earthy tones, stark black and white.

examples: A solitary [SUBJECT] hiker in a stark, treeless winter forest, a rustic [BUILDING_TYPE] cabin nestled among the desolate trees, with a foreground of abstract, swirling [GROUND_TEXTURE] patterns and a small reflective [WATER_BODY] pond. The overall atmosphere is [MOOD] eerie, with limited, desaturated [COLOR_PALETTE] blues and grays, rendered in a high-contrast linocut style with strong, graphic lines and textures. --ar 4:5

A lost [SUBJECT] child in a stark, treeless winter forest, a rustic [BUILDING_TYPE] shack nestled among the desolate trees, with a foreground of abstract, swirling [GROUND_TEXTURE] cracked earth patterns and a small reflective [WATER_BODY] puddle. The overall atmosphere is [MOOD] lonely, with limited, desaturated [COLOR_PALETTE] earthy tones, rendered in a high-contrast linocut style with strong, graphic lines and textures. --ar 4:5

An ancient [SUBJECT] artifact in a stark, treeless winter forest, a rustic [BUILDING_TYPE] ruin nestled among the desolate trees, with a foreground of abstract, swirling [GROUND_TEXTURE] mossy rocks patterns and a small reflective [WATER_BODY] stream. The overall atmosphere is [MOOD] mysterious, with limited, desaturated [COLOR_PALETTE] muted browns, rendered in a high-contrast linocut style with strong, graphic lines and textures. --ar 4:5

A lone [SUBJECT] wolf in a stark, treeless winter forest, a rustic [BUILDING_TYPE] wooden structure nestled among the desolate trees, with a foreground of abstract, swirling [GROUND_TEXTURE] icy patterns and a small reflective [WATER_BODY] frozen pool. The overall atmosphere is [MOOD] desolate, with limited, desaturated [COLOR_PALETTE] whites and blacks, rendered in a high-contrast linocut style with strong, graphic lines and textures. --ar 4:5
tips: Experiment with different [BUILDING_TYPE] and [SUBJECT] to create varied narratives.
Pay close attention to the descriptions of [GROUND_TEXTURE] and [WATER_BODY] to maintain the abstract, patterned quality.
The [COLOR_PALETTE] should generally lean towards muted or monochromatic tones to preserve the style.
description: Evokes a sense of stark, graphic beauty with a linocut aesthetic. Perfect for creating atmospheric and intriguing visuals that hint at deeper stories.
instructions: Use this template to generate similar images.
